definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: id.;—abs. ´[[בְּיוֹם ק]]: Na 3:17 a day of coldness, cold day, so Pr 25:20; ´[[ק]]: alone, cold of night Job 24:7; in gen., due to winds 37:9 ([[מִמְּזׇרִים]] v. [[זרה]]

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: ; yet Voigt Bu, attractively, [[מִמְּזׇוִים]] (cf. Ps 144:13) out of storehouses [‖[[חֶדֶר ]]]); [[לִפְנֵי קָרָתוֹ מִי יַעֲמׂד]] Ps 147:17, + pl. Zec 14:6 (rd. [[וְקָרוֹת]], v. [[יׇקָר]]). p.429
